title: Baked Feta with Chilli & Oregano
directions: Heat oven to 200C/180C fan/gas 6. Sit the feta on a sheet of foil. Scatter over the chilli and oregano, then drizzle with olive oil. Scrunch up the foil to seal the feta in a parcel, then place on a baking tray and bake for 10 mins until warmed and softened.
ingredients: 1 red chilli, deseeded and thinly sliced
